Song.title: Only Jesus
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Doug Plank © 2005 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| Bm7 G | D | Bm7 G | D |]
Verse 1: [Bm] [ ]Fat[G]her of g[D]race,{,} [Bm] [ ]You’ve s[G]acrif[D]iced Your only Son for [Bm]us,{,} the [G]crucified Je[Asus4]sus [Bm] [ ]Enl[G]arge our h[D]earts{,} [Bm] [ ]to l[G]ove Your S[D]on O grant to us the g[Bm]race{,} to [G]walk with Him a[Asus4]lways To make H[G]im our great d[Asus4]elight Bringing w[G]orship with our l[Asus4]ives
Chorus: Only J[Bm]esus! Only J[Gmaj7]esus!{,} Give us J[D]esus, we [Asus4]cry Only J[Bm]esus! Only J[E7/G#]esus!{,} The [G]Pearl of g[Gmaj7]reatest p[Asus4]rice
Verse 2: [Bm] [ ]Spir[G]it of g[D]race,{,} [Bm] [ ]You’ve sh[G]ed Your l[D]ight Upon our darkened [Bm]eyes,{,} un[G]veiling Jes[Asus4]us [ ]Christ [Bm] [ ]Come c[G]hange our [D]hearts,{,} [Bm] [ ]conf[G]orm our [D]ways To honor Jesus’ N[Bm]ame,{,} His [G]glory our r[Asus4]efrain Let His l[G]ove compel our [Asus4]own, As we w[G]orship at His th[Asus4]rone
Bridge: [D]Jesus, our great [Asus4]Savior, Lord of [Bm]heaven, Son of [D]God [D]Je[D2]sus,[Dsus4] [D]our great [Asus4]Savior[| A] [F#m]Lord of [Bm]heaven, [G2] [ ]Son of G[D]od [| A/C# (to chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 father of grace youve sacrificed your only son for us the crucified jesus enlarge our hearts to love your son o grant to us the grace to walk with him always to make him our great delight bringing worship with our lives chorus only jesus only jesus give us jesus we cry only jesus only jesus the pearl of greatest price verse 2 spirit of grace youve shed your light upon our darkened eyes unveiling jesus christ come change our hearts conform our ways to honor jesus name his glory our refrain let his love compel our own as we worship at his throne bridge jesus our great savior lord of heaven son of god jesus our great savior lord of heaven son of god
